about_the_game: Introducing the Phantom Fury digital artbook! Inside you will find over 100 pages of never-before-seen detailed environments, character and weapon concepts to immerse you into the Shelly “Bombshell” Harrison universe.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and gore in retro-style graphics. Violence against humans and human-like characters, including dismemberment. Mature and harsh language.

detailed_description: Introducing the Phantom Fury digital artbook! Inside you will find over 100 pages of never-before-seen detailed environments, character and weapon concepts to immerse you into the Shelly “Bombshell” Harrison universe.

name: Phantom Fury - Digital Artbook

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: Introducing the Phantom Fury digital artbook! Inside you will find over 100 pages of never-before-seen detailed environments, character and weapon concepts to immerse you into the Shelly “Bombshell” Harrison universe.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
